resources.string: Waiting to record your next trip
Power save active: trip recording suspended
You are logged out of the app.
You are outside of the period when you can start recording trips.
Your program has expired. Contact customer support.
Stop and standby for one hour
Background restriction settings are impacting the app.
%1$s needs to be enabled in \'Protected Apps\' to function properly.
Enter your information to create a new account.
Enter your email address and we\'ll email \nyou a PIN code to get back in the app.
Please enter your phone number below\nto receive your PIN code.
Enter the 4-digit PIN code we emailed you.
Already added DriveWell Go to your policy?
An 8-digit activation code was sent to the policyholder by email. Please enter below.
Your username will appear on leaderboards in the app.
We will never post without your permission!
Drive detection may be unavailable. Tap to attempt resolution.
Enable Google Location Accuracy to use %1$s
Enable Google Play Services to use %1$s
Power Save must be disabled for %1$s to record trips
Low battery preventing %1$s from recording trips
%1$s cannot currently record trips due to background restriction. Tap to fix the problem.
Android is preventing %1$s from recording trips. To resolve the problem, tap this notification and choose Allow to let %2$s run in the background.

Android is preventing %1$s from recording trips. To resolve the problem, tap this notification to go to your Battery Optimization Settings screen, find %2$s in the All list, and turn off battery optimization for the app.
Failed to acquire GPS lock during trip
If this issue persists, please try rebooting your phone
Alert will be sent in %1$d seconds
Phone battery low: trip recording disabled
Phone in power save mode: trip recording disabled
Google Location Accuracy is required for this app. Activate now?
Phone battery low: trip recording disabled
GPS is disabled due to low battery
Currently off duty - no trip recording
Tap the score display on the dashboard to see your score breakdown again.
We need to ask some permissions for DriveWell Go to work.
Tags must be linked to vehicles in order to record trips. To link your tag to your vehicle now, tap \'Link\' and follow the instructions.
Your phone does not have a gyroscope and when this app is used without a %s tag, the driver scoring for such phones is in beta. Please provide any feedback you have on your scores.
No scored trips yet. Start driving!
You don’t have any trips yet.
Keep driving! Trends will be unlocked in the next few days.
There was an error fetching your trends. Please try again later.
There was an error fetching your today\'s trends.
You don\'t have enough trips. Start driving to unlock streaks!
Please select a monthly mileage plan
You don\'t have any trips yet.
Start driving to see your trips and scores.
Without phone (not present or low battery)
Not recording\nWaiting for your next drive
How did you travel on this trip?
How did you travel on these trips?
No score will be calculated if you select that you are not driving a vehicle on this trip. This action cannot be undone.
Did you know you can label your trips?
Did you know your trips record in the background?
%1$s runs in the background and automatically records and scores your trips as you drive.\n\n%2$s will not record drives if the battery level is under %3$d%%
%1$s runs in the background and automatically records your trips as you drive.\n\n%2$s will not record drives if the battery level is under %3$d%%
This drive was interrupted due to low phone battery.
I was driving the vehicle and a score will be calculated.
I was driving the vehicle but my phone was used by a passenger and phone usage will be excluded from the score.
I was driving a motorcycle and the trip will not be scored.
In all these categories, a score is not calculated.
To use the DriveWell Go app,\nyou must accept the following terms and conditions:
I have read and agree to the terms and conditions of the DriveWell Go program.
Because no phone was present when this trip occurred, no location data can be shown.
Maps need a permission for faster loading.
No map is available for this trip. Please try again later.
Great Job! Your trip contains no events.
Your trip is currently being scored. Check back soon!
Your trip is currently being processed. Check back soon!
I was not using my phone
Please enter the correct speed limit
Please explain your "other" problem in the comment box
Please enter info to send feedback
This field can not be blank.
Upload trip data using Wi-Fi only

If you select this option, your trip data will be uploaded only when you come within range of a Wi-Fi network through which your phone has Internet connectivity. This option may cause trips to take longer to get delivered and processed.
If you select this option, trip detection may improve on some phones because the Android OS is less likely to kill the app\'s service when resources are low.
Samsung instructions: ensure the app is in the Unmonitored Apps list in order to record trips without the foreground notification.
Notify me when results are available
Notify me of Daily Trip Summaries

Clicking ‘OK’ will remove your account from this device. Are you sure you want to deregister your device?\nIf you deregister, you can sign in as a returning user and use the PIN code sent to the email registered.
Your customer status has changed. You need to authenticate again.
Your username will appear on leaderboards in the app.

resources.string:
%s

If the email you entered above is incorrect, you will not receive the pin code to your email.
Invite your friends and help make them better, smarter, and safer drivers. Ask them to install the %1$s App today.
We respect privacy, therefore your contact list is not shared with anybody, even us.
Invites could not be sent. Please check your internet connection.
No valid emails selected or entered
Enter a username to add your friend
Couldn\'t add friend. Please check your Internet connection.
Contact us with questions or feedback
Your message has been sent. Thank you for your feedback!
Please enter your email so we can get back to you.
Have you enjoyed using this app?
Would you like to rate this app?
Enable location access to measure\nand improve your driving!
Enable location access to improve your driving and qualify for rewards!
Enable location access to improve your driving and qualify for discounts!
Enable location access to improve your driving and qualify for low mileage benefits!
%s uses your location data to accurately measure your trips and provide you with mapped views of your driving routes.
%s uses your location to accurately measure your trips, provide you with mapped views of your driving routes, and provide your rewards.
%s uses your location to accurately measure your trips, provide you with mapped views of your driving routes, and provide your discount.
%s uses your location to accurately measure your trips, provide you with mapped views of your driving routes, and provide your low mileage benefits.
You selected \"Never ask again\" last time we asked for Location permissions. Please go to Settings and turn the location permission on for %s.
%1$s requires your location all the time
To record trips, %1$s needs location access both while using the app and when the app is in the background. Without location set to \"Allow all the time\", %2$s will not work.

Love a good discount? %1$s needs location access while using the app and when it is in the background to automatically record your drives. Safe drives can save you money!
On the next screen, please select \"Allow all the time\".

Want your rewards? %1$s needs location access while using the app and when it is in the background to automatically record your drives. Safe drives can earn you prizes!
On the next screen, please select \"Allow all the time\".

Don’t miss out! %1$s needs location access while using the app and when it is in the background to automatically record your drives and provide low mileage benefits.
On the next screen, please select \"Allow all the time\".
%s uses your location data to accurately measure your trips and provide you with mapped views of your driving routes. Without it, the app will not function properly.
%s uses your location data to accurately measure your trips and provide you with mapped views of your driving routes. This is required to determine your discount.
%s uses your location data to accurately measure your trips and provide you with mapped views of your driving routes. This is required to provide your rewards.
%s uses your location data to accurately measure your trips and provide you with mapped views of your driving routes. This is required for your low mileage benefits.
%s uses your location data to accurately measure your trips and provide you with mapped views of your driving routes. Without it, the app will not work.
%1$s requires access to your activity permissions

%1$s uses your activity data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. To record your drives and get your score, you must select \"Allow\" on the next screen.
%1$s uses your activity data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. To record your drives, you must select \"Allow\" on the next screen.

%1$s uses your activity data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. To record your drives and qualify for discounts, you must select \"Allow\" on the next screen.

%1$s uses your activity data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. To record your drives and get your rewards, you must select \"Allow\" on the next screen.

%1$s uses your activity data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. To record your drives and qualify for low mileage benefits, you must select \"Allow\" on the next screen.
%1$s uses your activity data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. To record your drives and get your score, you must select %2$s on the next screen.
%1$s uses your activity data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. To record your drives, you must select %2$s on the next screen.

%1$s uses your activity data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. To record your drives and qualify for discounts, you must select %2$s on the next screen.
%1$s uses your activity data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. To record your drives and get your rewards, you must select %2$s on the next screen.

%1$s uses your activity data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. To record your drives and qualify for low mileage benefits, you must select %2$s on the next screen.
%s uses your motion data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. Without it, the app will not function properly.
%s uses your motion data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. This is required to determine your discount.
%s uses your motion data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. This is required to provide your rewards.
%s uses your motion data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. This is required for your low mileage benefits.
%s uses your motion data to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle rather than walking or running. Without it, the app will not work.
We hope you enjoyed your trial experience.\nUnfortunately, your trial has expired.
No data. Check your internet connection.
Please write in the space below (2000 character maximum) and press send. A member of our team will respond shortly.
Let us know your feedback so we can make improvements…
How can we make your experience better?
Please check your e-mail for a PIN code and enter it below.
Sorry, please enter a valid PIN code.
Sorry! We had an error communicating with our server.
Sorry! This email is already in use.
Sorry! This device has sent too many registration requests recently. Please try again later or contact customer support.
Sorry! We could not find a matching account.
This PIN code has expired. Please generate a new one.
Sorry! The PIN code you entered is incorrect.
Sorry! This username is already in use.
We\'ve encountered an unknown error. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support.
Your email address appears to be invalid because it bounced
This email address has been subject to a complaint and cannot be used

We were not able to request a quote at this time

We are having a network issue. Please try again later.
This impact alert does not exist.
Sorry! This account has already been activated.
Sorry! This enrollment code is invalid.
Internal server error. Please try again later.
This tag is already linked to another user. Please try with a different tag. Contact support@cmtelematics.com if you believe you have received this message in error.
This tag is unknown to CMT. Please try with a different tag. Contact support@cmtelematics if you believe you have received this message in error.
This policy number and driver\'s license number are already registered.
Sorry! This mobile number is already in use.
Sorry! This mobile number is already in use.

Did you know you can create or join a family group to share scores, trends, streaks, trips, and current location with your family?
You will be sharing your score, streaks, trends, trips, and the last location you drove.
Hi! You have been invited by %2$s to join their %3$s group.
If you join this new family, you will be removed from your current family. Are you sure you want to join?
If you join this new family, your current family will be disbanded. Are you sure you want to join?
Did you know you can create a family group to share scores, streaks, trends, trips, and current location with your family?
No thanks, not at this time
Know someone using %1$s? Share this family code to share trips & scores. Let the games begin!
Please enter a username to invite a family member
Are you sure you would like to remove %s from your family?
As the admin, removing yourself from your family will cause the family to be deleted. Are you sure you would like to proceed?

Stop sharing your location and trip data
Your family will no longer be able to see your location and trip data.
Share your location and trip data?
Your family will be able to see your location and trip data.

Oops! There was a system error.
Family could not be created at this time.
Could not join %s\'s family. This family no longer exists.
%s. Family details are not available at this time.

Hi! %1$s has invited you to join their family on %2$s. If you have the app installed, tap on Family on the dashboard, and enter the code %3$s to join the family and share driving scores!

What would you like to do?
You can only be in 1 family at a time.

Activity recognition permissions required for %1$s to record trips
Location permission must be granted to properly record trips
Activity recognition permission must be granted to properly record trips
%1$s needs permissions to work. Go to permissions for %2$s and disable \"Remove permissions if app isn\’t used\" at the bottom of the screen.
You’ve completed your first trip and earned a reward!
In order to have a score, you need at least seven days of data collection from the first trip and one more trip after the seventh day.
You don\'t qualify for any rewards yet. Keep driving.

The merchants represented are not sponsors of the rewards or otherwise affiliated with this company. The logos and other identifying marks attached are trademarks of and owned by each represented company and/or its affiliates. Please visit each company\'s website for additional terms and conditions.
Your new Available Balance will be %s.
Your redemption code will be emailed to you.
Great job! You\'re on track to receive %1$s on %2$s. Keep up your score and drive at least %3$s to earn rewards.
Your location is needed to determine what leaderboard is displayed to you.
Is %1$s your location? You cannot change this once it is set.
Are you sure you want to skip?
Your location is not eligible the competition.
Set your location to be eligible for the competition.
Since app installation, this device has not connected to any tags.
If you do not need to install a tag at this time, you can <u>skip this process</u>
Congratulations! Your Tag is now linked.\n\nAttach it to the windshield behind the rearview mirror.
Please enter your registration information below.
Link the Tag you\'re installing in your vehicle or add a new vehicle.
In order to begin using %s you will need to add a vehicle to your account and link a tag to the vehicle. To begin this process, tap Add Vehicle

1. Enter the vehicle with your phone and Tag. Make sure no other Tag is in the vehicle.
 
 2. Press and hold the button on the Tag until its light turns on. 
 
 3. Place the Tag next to your phone. When your phone detects the Tag, a confirmation will appear.

1. Enter the vehicle with your phone and Tag. Make sure no other Tag is in the vehicle.

2. Tap the “Link Tag” button below. Then press and hold the button on the tag for a few seconds until the light blinks indicating the tag is active.

3. Place the Tag next to your phone. When your phone detects the Tag, a confirmation will appear.

1. Enter vehicle with your phone and Tag. Make sure no other Tag is in the vehicle.

2. Press and hold the button on the Tag until the light blinks.

3. Tap the “Link Tag” button.

4. When your phone detects the Tag, tap the device in the popup.
Tag linking could not complete due to a problem with CDM association. Please try again later.
Please confirm that the light is blinking on the tag and the number printed on it is %s
Please confirm that the number printed on the tag is %s
Start driving or return to the Vehicles screen to link another Tag.
We could not find any tags to link! Be sure to press the button on the tag for 4 seconds and hold it close to the phone.
Network connection failure while linking. Please try again later.
We found a tag, but it\'s already linked! Please ensure that the tag you are trying to link is the closest tag to the phone.
Fatal error while linking. Please contact support.
Tag %s cannot be linked to this vehicle
Tag Linking Error. Please Contact Support.
Please wait until tag is connected. Do not leave this screen.
Unsupported OS for associating companion device
Move the tag closer to the phone and press \"Link Tag\" again
Enter a new name to display for your vehicle
After installing your tag in your vehicle, hold down the button on the tag until the light comes on.\n\nWhen the tag appears in the list below, tap \'Link Tag\' to link it and give it a nickname.
Improve the app\'s ability to record your drives by updating your tag link!
You have no vehicles associated with your account.

Not bad, but there\'s room to improve
Be cautious and focus on the drive
You were distracted for \n%1$s while driving.
You used your phone %1$s while driving.
Distraction data will show here \nafter you start driving.
All drivers in your policy need to install the app
Invite other drivers on your policy via text to download the app. Make sure they have consented to receiving this text message.\n(Data and Message Rates may apply)
Tap here to skip invitation for now.
Well done! It looks like all eligible drivers on your policy are using the app already.
A mobile number entered was not valid. Please try again.
There was a phone number entered that may already be in use by another driver. Please review the information and try again.
Move away from traffic if you can. If anyone is injured, call 911
Don\'t discuss who is at fault. Exchange driver\'s license number and insurance details with other drivers.
Take photos of any car damage as well as photos of the crash scene.
We have your back in the case of a crash and we\'re constantly working to improve our product performance
Here are some tips for documenting\na crash.
Don\'t admit fault! Call your insurer first.
Exchange information with all drivers\ninvolved, including:
- Driver\'s license and license plate number
- Make, model, year, and color of vehicle
Take pictures of any damage to your car\nand other cars.

With the button below, you can start the account deletion process. When deleted, your account will be removed from our systems and you will be unable to log in using the app in the future. This action is not reversible.

Please note that if your account is deleted, you will no longer be able to record your drives or get feedback on your driving behavior. You will also no longer be eligible for any future benefits of using the app such as discounts or rewards.

Your Account Will Be Deleted Soon

We are currently processing your request, and you will be logged out of the app once your account is deleted.

If this request was in error, please contact app-support@cmtelematics.com
We could not process your request. Please contact support.

This user has used the account delete feature in the app to request that their account be removed. Please delete the user’s account in your systems and ensure that you delete it in CMT\'s systems as well via B2B API call.

If you don\'t respond, we\'ll assume you need help and call you in %d secs.(Note: In demo mode, we won\'t call)
We will call you to confirm.
CrashAssist is enabled and is protecting you on every trip. Safe travels!
We detect a crash and send you a notification to confirm. If you don’t respond, we call you. If we still don’t hear from you, we’ll send help to your location.
If you need help, we’ll coordinate a tow and/or an ambulance as soon as possible.
We’ll know where you are through the app, so you won’t have to worry about identifying your location.
We’ll gather details about your crash to expedite the digital claim process. All you’ll have to do is fill in a few more blanks.
For more information, view CrashAssist requirements
Navigate to Settings to enable CrashAssist and protect yourself on the road.
